section.title: Log
section.para: View to check System Log that occurs in Oden Server.

section.title: Oden System Log
section.para: When a problem occurs during deployment, this view helps when it is difficult to find the cause only with message, or is used for debugging by developer. Log can be checked by date. Through it, you can see what kind of problem occurred between Oden Admin and Oden Server.

note.para: Only Admin role can use this function.
